text: Jevha tumacya purvicya kalatila lokampaiki ase bhala'i karanare loka ka nahi jhaleta, jyanni dharativara phasada (utpata) pasaravinyasa pratibandha ghatala asata, jya thodya lokankherija jyanna amhi tyancyapaiki sutaka pradana keli hoti. Atyarari loka tara tya gosticya mage lagale, jyata tyanna susampanna kele gele hote ani te duracari hote
